Package pacman

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.GameManager
  • public final class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class that stores and manages the current global state of the game.

      • restartGame

        public void restartGame​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Restart the game and reset game state, if the KeyCode of the parameter is ESCAPE. Pause if the keycode is P.
        Parameters:
        event - A keypress event from which the exact key pressed is extracted.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
